txt.en: 'Many of the Oathbreakers appear to have marched with Aragorn. A group of them however, the Ruthless Dead, refused to accept his offer and now stew within the tunnels and caves of the Paths of the Dead. They are beyond redemption. Though they cannot be killed, they can be quieted for a period.\n\n'Kêr Izel is within the Paths of the Dead, far north of here. Venture within and quiet any Ruthless Dead you encounter within.'
Golusel is in Dol Amroth.\n\nGolusel will be pleased to hear many Ruthless Dead have been quieted.
Defeat Ruthless Dead in Kêr Izel ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Ruthless Dead, irredeemable Oathbreakers who did not follow Aragorn, are still within the Paths of the Dead.
Defeated Ruthless Dead in Kêr Izel ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I fear we are ultimately fighting a losing battle, but at this point I do not know what else we could do.'
Ruthless Dead can be found within Kêr Izel, in the Paths of the Dead, far to the north of Dol Amroth.\n\nGolusel asked you to quiet the Ruthless Dead within the lower city of the Paths of the Dead.
